title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, ch. XXI, pt. 836 - Incident Reporting in Oasas Certified, Licensed, Funded, or Operated Services
content:

Statutory Authority: Mental Hygiene Law Sections 19.07(c), 19.07(e), 19.09(b), 19.20, 19.20 -a, 19.21(b), 19.40, 22.07(c), 32.01, 32.02, 32.07(a), 33.16, 33.23, 33.25; Executive Law sections 296, 491 and 495,; Civil

Special Needs Act (Chapter 501 of the Laws of
2012

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
